title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4052.1 - Length of steeplechase course
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4052.1 - Length of steeplechase course

State Regulations

No steeplechase course built entirely within the
confines of a race course used for races on the flat shall be approved by the
commission unless the circumference of said race course, measured along the
inside rail thereof, is at least one mile. Nothing in this section, however, shall affect steeplechase courses approved by the stewards of the National

Steeplechase and Hunt Association prior to the enactment thereof or courses
under the jurisdiction of the hunts committee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4052.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
